summary:
More than 15 years professional experiences in the field of accounting and financial management, audit & compliance with international development organizations. Demonstrated skills in developing and implementing financial and internal controls and processes, effective grant management, financial analysis and reporting. Skilled in budget and budgetary control, treasury management, human resources, procurement, administration, taxation & VAT issues. Adept at identifying and implementing innovative practices and procedures to improve efficiency & effectiveness of operations.
Have advanced knowledge of ERP software: Oracle and SAP. Excellent in Microsoft Office Packages in cloud-based environment.  Knowledge of international accounting and financial reporting standards. Experienced in multi-donor and multi-agency accounting and budgeting. Experienced in Jira based software and operational dashboard reporting. Good command of English, some knowledge in Arabic. Gained knowledge and practical experience by participating lots of training in home and abroad.
